snippet: A black student who says his suite mates at a California university put a bike lock around his neck and racially harassed him has filed a $5 million claim against the school....

headline.print_headline: California Student Files Claim Over Racial Abuse
headline.main: California Student Files Claim Over Racial Abuse

lead_paragraph: A black student who says his suite mates at a California university put a bike lock around his neck and racially harassed him has filed a $5 million claim against the school.
